verses.name: Joshua 16:1
verses.text: And the lot of the children of Joseph fell from Jordan by Jericho, unto the water of Jericho on the east, to the wilderness that goeth up from Jericho throughout mount Beth–el,

verses.name: Joshua 16:2
verses.text: And goeth out from Beth–el to Luz, and passeth along unto the borders of Archi to Ataroth,

verses.name: Joshua 16:3
verses.text: And goeth down westward to the coast of Japhleti, unto the coast of Beth–horon the nether, and to Gezer: and the goings out thereof are at the sea.

verses.name: Joshua 16:4
verses.text: So the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.
